sentence:
…by Hurricane  Helene, the most devastating storm in our State's history. We lost over  100 lives, and countless communities were changed forever.

In the immediate aftermath of Hurricane Helene, FEMA provided  indispensable support to save lives, clear debris, and house families  who lost everything.

As hurricane season begins, it is a disgrace that…

Mr. BILIRAKIS. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize the outstanding  contributions that Ms. Tyra Youngblood has made to our community in the  aftermath of Hurricane Milton. In addition to providing countless hours  of direct support to neighbors and flood victims, she helped coordinate  the collection and distribution of emergency…
